Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees Guitar comes with OHSC in excellent condition and signed checklist Case has a few surface scratches. Overall condition: - Guitar is in excellent condition - Frets are in excellent condition - Neck is straight - All electronics work as they should - Very light surface scratches here and there mostly invisible on the pictures - One small visible scratch in the finish on the top (1/16 inch) - No buckle wear Specifications: - Weight: 8 lbs 9 oz - 50' neck profile - 57 Classic pickups - Kluson Tuners Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
Title: 2012 Gibson Les Paul Traditional Heritage Sunburst with OHSC
